Description: On I-64 in the City of Hampton, at Hampton Roads Bridge Tunnel East, motorists can expect potential delays due to a bridge/tunnel stoppage. All east lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Bridge/Tunnel Stoppage

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 172.6 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-81 at mile marker 213.6 in the County of Augusta, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. All north lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 147.4 in the County of Stafford, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-395 at mile marker 8 in the County of Arlington, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The south right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash
